tool_description: Provides information about different Zoo Animals
name: Zoo Animal API
title: Zoo Animal API

api_list.name: Get Random Zoo Animals
api_list.description: Shows the user different zoo animals everytime they call the API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zoo-animal-api3.p.rapidapi.com/animals/rand"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zoo-animal-api3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://zoo-animal-api3.p.rapidapi.com/animals/rand"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zoo-animal-api3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
